Everest 是 Celeste 的开源模组加载器和模组 API，允许您根据自: Everest is an open-source mod loader and modding API for Celeste that allows you to create custom map packs, texture replacements, and code mods according to your preferences. Modding requires Everest to be installed. CeleMod can assist you in downloading and installing Everest with just one click.
将无法继续使用: you won't be able to continue using it.
在境内可以正常使用游戏内的下载和更新: &&In mainland China, game's internal downloads and updates can be used normally.
提供比异变更多的改变游戏画面、内容、玩法的选项: Provides more options to change the game's visuals, content, and gameplay than variants.
实时存档读档（SL）、调试地图和传送、速通计时器、一键望远镜等: Real-time save/load (SL), debugging maps and teleportation, speedrun timer, one-click telescope, etc.
用于编写TAS，也可以显示碰撞箱、数值面板等: Used for writing TAS, can also display collision boxes, numerical panels, etc.
生成随机地图，可用于联机: Generate random maps, can be used for online play.
随机地图菜单中文翻译: Translation of Random Map Menu in Chinese
实时显示死亡次数: Display Death Count in Real Time
标记每次死亡的位置: Mark the Location of Each Death
指示附近的收集品、将身后的草莓变透明: Indicate Nearby Collectibles and Make Strawberries Behind Transparent
提供更多、更完整的存档备份: Provide more complete backup of save files.
小工具合集：草莓统计、视角引导、跳过序章、尖刺置前: Collection of tools: Strawberry count, camera guide, skip prologue, spike placement.
复活时将BGM同步到上次存档，便于视频剪辑: Synchronize BGM with last save file when respawning, convenient for video editing.
给一次性水晶加上红色边框: Give one-time crystal a red border.
优化冰墙显示，具有减小贴图厚度等多种选项: Optimize ice wall display, with options to reduce texture thickness, etc.
给移动块加上白色边框，避免因为背景太黑了看不到: Add white border to moving blocks to avoid them being invisible due to a dark background.
彩虹头、双马尾皮肤: Rainbow head and twin tails skin
用星星代替金旗: Use Stars instead of Gold Flag

启用的，依赖此 Mod 的 Mod: {slot0}: Mods that depend on this Mod: {slot0}

你需要在 Celeste 群服论坛 注册一个账号: &&You need to register an account on the Celeste server forum.
打开游戏后，你将需要在 Mod 设置中启用并登录群服 Mod: &&After launching the game, you will need to enable and log in to the Multiplayer Server Mod in the Mod settings.
这里将会列出一些推荐安装的模组及其简介，请按需安装: Here you will find a list of recommended mods to install along with their descriptions. Please install as needed.
更新失败，请查看左下角: The update failed, please check the lower left corner
